# Black body radiation

## Equation

$$ g(\epsilon) = {8\pi V \over h^3c_0^3} \epsilon^2 {1 \over \exp \left({\epsilon \over k_BT}\right)-1} $$

```{julia}
#| label: using-things
#| eval: true
#| include: false

using Plots
```

## Calculation

```{julia}
#| label: using-things
#| eval: true
#| include: true

c = 3.0e8
h = 6.626e-34
kb = 1.381e-23

blackbody(λ::Float64, t::Float64) = (2*h*c^2/λ^5) * (1/(exp(h*c/λ/kb/t)-1))
```
